pr_title: [fr] added rule for CEST, adjusted replace.txt & tests

           <example correction="trois fois par semaine">Je joue au Softball <marker>trois fois au semaine</marker>.</example>

timeline.author: jaumeortola
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -29525,6 +29538,21 @@ though, and has since been slightly modified)-->
       </rule>
   </category>
   <category id="CAT_TYPOGRAPHIE" name="Typographie">
+      <rule id="CEST_TYPO" name="Typo c'est">
+      <antipattern>
+          <token regexp="yes">\d+</token>
+          <token>cest</token>
+      </antipattern>
+      <pattern>
+          <token>cest
+              <exception case_sensitive="yes">CEST</exception>
+          </token>
+      </pattern>
+      <message>Did you mean <suggestion>c'est</suggestion> ?</message>
+      <example correction="c'est">Tu penses que <marker>cest</marker> bon ?</example>

timeline.message: [fr] added rule for CEST, adjusted replace.txt & tests

timeline.bodyText: Seems this line was committed by accident
timeline.author: danielnaber
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -29652,6 +29665,22 @@ though, and has since been slightly modified)-->
         <example>Bonjour à (…)</example>
       </rule>
     </rulegroup>
+      <rule id="CEST_TYPO" name="Typo c'est">
+      <antipattern>
+          <token regexp="yes">\d+</token>
+          <token>cest</token>
+      </antipattern>
+      <pattern>
+          <token>cest
+              <exception case_sensitive="yes">CEST</exception>
+          </token>
+      </pattern>
+      <message>Did you mean <suggestion>c'est</suggestion> ?</message>
+      <example correction="c'est">Tu penses que <marker>cest</marker> bon ?</example>
+      <example>La présentation commence à 15:00 CEST</example>
+      <example>La présentation commence à 15:00 cest</example>
+    </rule>
+>>>>>>> 759716a1a9... [fr] added rule for CEST, adjusted replace.txt & tests
